Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Lock
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Trains Resuming Normal Routing on Loop 'L'
ShortDescription: Purple Line Express trains are resuming their normal routing and stop pattern around the Loop 'L' after crews fixed a track switching problem near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line Express trains are resuming their normal routing and stopping pattern around the Loop 'L' after crews fixed a track switching problem near Clark/Lake.

Board Purple Line Express trains on their usual platforms at Loop 'L' stations (Inner Loop/clockwise/Orange Line side).
